rules_text: {U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. Then if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, untap Hank McCoy and transform him.
rules_text2:
Trample
Whenever Beast deals combat damage to a player, create that many Invention tokens. Then if there are four or more card types among permanents you control, draw a card. [i](Inventions are artifacts with “{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Scry 1.”)[/i]
